title: Django Hosting Panel
description:
Django Hosting Panel

Moderated by Sean O'Connor; Panelists: Gabriel Grant
(`dotCloud <http://www.dotcloud.com/>`__), Nate Aune
(`DjangoZoom <http://djangozoom.com/>`__), Andrew Godwin
(`Epio <http://ep.io/>`__), James Tauber
(`Eldarion <http://eldarion.com/>`__), Brian Rosner
(`Eldarion <http://eldarion.com/>`__), Even Hazlett
(`apphosted <http://apphosted.com/>`__)

Over the last year there's a been a whole new crop of specialized
hosting platforms for Django applications. In this panel, we speak to a
number of the people behind these new platforms to discuss what benefits
they offer, what challenges they face, and what the Django
project/community can do to encourage their growth.
